HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. It showcases products and provides navigation to different sections of the website.

elements.name: Search Products
elements.description: Search input field for products and parts.

elements.name: Shop Now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Hushjet purifier product page.

elements.name: Deals
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair care
elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the air purifier products page.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the headphones products page.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.name: Support
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

elements.name: Discover Dyson
elements.description: Link to the Discover Dyson page.

elements.name: For business
elements.description: Link to the For business page.

elements.name: Store finder
elements.description: Link to the Store finder page.

elements.name: Register machine
elements.description: Link to the Register machine page.

elements.name: Contact us
elements.description: Link to the Contact us page.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'
Page contains the text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI'

DysonHairCarePage.description: This page is the Dyson Hair Care landing page, showcasing various hair care products and information.

elements.name: Hair Care Tab
elements.description: Link to the main Hair Care page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field for products and parts.

elements.name: Hair Stylers
elements.description: Link to the Hair Stylers product category.

elements.name: Hair Dryers
elements.description: Link to the Hair Dryers product category.

elements.name: Hair Straighteners
elements.description: Link to the Hair Straighteners product category.

elements.name: Professional Hair Care
elements.description: Link to the Professional Hair Care product category.

elements.name: Shop All Hair Care
elements.description: Link to view all hair care products.

elements.name: Gifts
elements.description: Link to the Gifts section.

elements.name: Cases, Accessories & Attachments
elements.description: Link to the Cases, Accessories & Attachments section.

elements.name: Styling Guides
elements.description: Link to the Styling Guides section.

elements.name: Hair Science
elements.description: Link to the Hair Science section.

DysonAirTreatmentPage.description: This page is the Dyson Air Treatment landing page, specifically focusing on Air Purifiers. It allows users to explore and learn about Dyson's air purifier products.

elements.name: Air Purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the Air Purifier section.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input box to find products and parts.

elements.name: Air Purifiers
elements.description: Link to the Air Purifiers category.

elements.name: Purifier + Heaters
elements.description: Link to the Purifier + Heaters category.

elements.name: Shop all air purifiers
elements.description: Link to shop all air purifiers.

elements.name: Exclusive Offer Close Button
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer banner.

DysonHeadphonesPage.description: This page is dedicated to showcasing and promoting Dyson Headphones, specifically the 'OnTrac' model. It provides information about the product's features and directs users to purchase options.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the Headphones section of the Dyson website.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to search for products and parts.

elements.name: OnTrac Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the OnTrac headphones product page.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product purchase page.

elements.name: Ear cushions & caps Link
elements.description: Link to the Ear cushions & caps product page.

elements.name: Close Promotion
elements.description: Button to close the promotion banner.

DysonLightingPage.description: This page displays information about Dyson Lighting products and related support.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the Dyson Lighting product page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input box to find products and parts.

elements.name: Dyson Solarcycle Morph
elements.description: Link to the Dyson Solarcycle Morph product page.

elements.name: Shop lighting
elements.description: Link to the Dyson shop lighting page.

elements.name: Sure, I'll give feedback
elements.description: Button to provide feedback.

elements.name: No thanks
elements.description: Button to decline providing feedback.

elements.name: Close Exclusive Offer
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer banner.

assertions: The 'Search products and parts' search box is present

UnknownPage.description: This is the Dyson Support page, where users can find help, spare parts, and guides for their Dyson products.

elements.name: Search products and parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Solve a problem
elements.description: Link to the troubleshooting tool.

elements.name: Find the right part
elements.description: Link to find spare parts.

elements.name: Tips, user guides and software updates
elements.primary_locator: text=Tips, user guides and software updates
elements.description: Link to user guides and software updates.

elements.name: Start troubleshooting
elements.description: Link to start troubleshooting.

elements.name: Find parts
elements.description: Link to find parts.

elements.name: See all tips and guides
elements.description: Link to see all tips and guides.

assertions: Page contains 'Solve a problem, find spare parts and read expert tips and guides.'
